home.title: Maximize the Profitability of your
home.subtitle: Advanced AI-driven energy arbitrage tool for Battery Energy Storage Systems in the Spanish market.
home.bess_title: The Intelligence Engine for your Storage
home.bess_description: Our AI learns from the interconnection between weather data and gas fundamentals to optimize your BESS operations and maximize ROI.
home.data_input_description: High-resolution integration of meteorological forecasts from 10 strategic nodes in Spain, combined with real-time Gas, CO2, and Iberian market fundamentals.
home.model_submodels_description: A cascaded architecture of specialized neural networks where demand and generation forecasts flow into a final, high-fidelity price optimization layer.
home.optimization_description: Advanced optimization algorithms that determine the most profitable charge and discharge schedules based on predicted market conditions and system constraints.
home.comparison_description: Continuous validation against market outcomes and theoretical optima to ensure maximum predictive accuracy and risk transparency.
